name: Escape Velocity
description: Escape Velocity is a singleplayer game that tells the rather extraordinary life story of an ordinary man who struggles to obtain the things he desires. The game seamlessly interweaves robust runner-like gameplay mechanics with an engaging story, which has been previously unexplored or a weakly employed combination in endless runner games...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or Better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM Storage: 600 MB available space
